title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.4 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.4 - Exemptions

State Regulations

The following shall be exempt from the requirements of this

Part: (a) institutions authorized to
confer degrees in this State; (b) institutions chartered to provide elementary or secondary education; (c) licensed private trade schools and
registered private business schools licensed and/or registered pursuant to
sections
5001
and
5002
of the

Education Law; and
(d) other
institutions or schools as the commissioner, in his discretion, may
determine. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
167.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
